data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِي comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word فَقَالَ comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.
data.sentence: The word أَيَّامٍ comes from the root ي و م and is associated with the meanings: day, era, time, today, this/that day, age/period of time.

data.meanings: to make a third part of a thing, one third, by threes.
data.sentence: The word ثَلَاثَةَ comes from the root ث ل ث and is associated with the meanings: to make a third part of a thing, one third, by threes.

data.meanings: bring, convey, benefit, bestowed upon; alter or change a thing for the worse, corrupted, tainted, infected, render it ill-smelling; adjusting, repairing; difference between two persons; become jealous; procure; other than (exclusively), except, without; lies; [a man’s] dislike of another’s participation in what supposedly his right; care of what is sacred or inviolable to avoid suspicion of disdain; cognizance or badge of a free non-Muslim subjects in a Muslim government; one who puts off the furniture of his camel from off him to relieve and ease him. mughiraat - raiders.
data.sentence: The word غَيْرُ comes from the root غ ي ر and is associated with the meanings: bring, convey, benefit, bestowed upon; alter or change a thing for the worse, corrupted, tainted, infected, render it ill-smelling; adjusting, repairing; difference between two persons; become jealous; procure; other than (exclusively), except, without; lies; [a man’s] dislike of another’s participation in what supposedly his right; care of what is sacred or inviolable to avoid suspicion of disdain; cognizance or badge of a free non-Muslim subjects in a Muslim government; one who puts off the furniture of his camel from off him to relieve and ease him. mughiraat - raiders.

data.meanings: to cut/wound/slay, hamstrung, produce no result, be barren (e.g. womb).
data.sentence: The word فَعَقَرُوهَا comes from the root ع ق ر and is associated with the meanings: to cut/wound/slay, hamstrung, produce no result, be barren (e.g. womb).

data.meanings: to enjoy/benefit, gift, anything useful/advantageous, goods (e.g. utensils, furniture), a commodity.
data.sentence: The word تَمَتَّعُوا comes from the root م ت ع and is associated with the meanings: to enjoy/benefit, gift, anything useful/advantageous, goods (e.g. utensils, furniture), a commodity.
The word دَارِكُمْ comes from the root د و ر and is associated with the meanings: To go round, revolve, circulate.

data.meanings: to promise, give one's word, threaten, promise good, threaten (depending on context).. . Wa'ada act (pr.f 3rd. p. m. sing.): He promised.. Wa'adta (prf. 2nd. p. m. sing.): Thou promised.. Wa'adtu (prf. 1st. p. m. sing.): I promised.. Wa'aduu (prf. 3rd. p. plu.): They promised.. Wa'adna  (prf. 1st. p. m.): We promise.. Ya'idu (imp. 3rd. p. m. sing.): He promises, threatens.. 'Id (prt. m. sing.): promise.. Wu'ida (pp. 3rd. p. sing.): Has been promised.. Yuu'aduuna (pip. 3rd. p. plu.): They were threatened.. Tu'aduuna  (pip. 2nd. p. plu.) You are promised, are threatened.. Mau'uud (pic. pact. n. sing.): Promised.. Tuu'aduuna  (imp. 2nd. p. m. plu. II.): (Punishment which) you are promised.. Waa'adna (imp. 1st. p. plu. III.): We made an appointment, a promise.. Tawaa'dtum (prf. 2nd. p. m. plu.): Ye have mutually appointed.. Laa Tawaa'duu  (prt. neg. m.plu.): Do not appoint mutually; Make no agreement or promises.. Wa'iid (act. 2nd. pic. m. sing.): Threatening; Threat; Warning.. Mau'idan (n. place): Time; Place or time of the fulfilment of a prediction; Promise or warning; Appointment for meeting a promise.. Mii'aad  (for Miu'aad; n. place): Time; Time or place of the promise.

Yuu'aduuna (pip. 3rd. p. plu.): They were threatened.. Tu'aduuna  (pip. 2nd. p. plu.) You are promised, are threatened.. Mau'uud (pic. pact. n. sing.): Promised.. Tuu'aduuna  (imp. 2nd. p. m. plu. II.): (Punishment which) you are promised.. Waa'adna (imp. 1st. p. plu. III.): We made an appointment, a promise.. Tawaa'dtum (prf. 2nd. p. m. plu.): Ye have mutually appointed.. Laa Tawaa'duu  (prt. neg. m.plu.): Do not appoint mutually; Make no agreement or promises.. Wa'iid (act. 2nd. pic. m. sing.): Threatening; Threat; Warning.. Mau'idan (n. place): Time; Place or time of the fulfilment of a prediction; Promise or warning; Appointment for meeting a promise.. Mii'aad  (for Miu'aad; n. place): Time; Time or place of the promise.

data.meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.
data.sentence: The word مَكْذُوبٍ comes from the root ك ذ ب and is associated with the meanings: To lie, say what is not a fact, lie to falsely invent, tell lies about or against, fabricate a lie, relate a lie, say a falsehood, be wrong, be cut off, deceive, disappoint the expectation of.
